verses.verse: And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> all Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, Hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, O Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, the statutes <S%H2706><s%> and judgments <S%H4941><s%> which I speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in your ears <S%H241><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%>, that ye may learn <S%H3925><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them, and keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> them.
The YY <S%H3068><s%> our 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with us in Horev <S%H2722><s%>.

The YY <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not this covenant <S%H1285><s%> with our fathers <S%H1><s%>, but with us <S%H587><s%>, even us, who are all of us <S%H428><s%> here alive <S%H2416><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%>.
The YY <S%H3068><s%> talked <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> with you face <S%H6440><s%> to face <S%H6440><s%> in the mount <S%H2022><s%> out of the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the fire <S%H784><s%>,

(I stood <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8802><s%> between the YY <S%H3068><s%> and you at that time <S%H6256><s%>, to shew <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8687><s%> you the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>: for ye were afraid <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8804><s%> by reason <S%H6440><s%> of the fire <S%H784><s%>, and went not up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8804><s%> into the mount <S%H2022><s%>;) saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

I am the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, which brought thee out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8689><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, from the house <S%H1004><s%> of bondage <S%H5650><s%>.
Thou shalt have none other <S%H312><s%> 'elohim <S%H430><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me.

Thou shalt not make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee any graven image <S%H6459><s%>, or any likeness <S%H8544><s%> of any thing that is in heaven <S%H8064><s%> above <S%H4605><s%>, or that is in the earth <S%H776><s%> beneath, or that is in the waters <S%H4325><s%> beneath the earth <S%H776><s%>:

Thou shalt not bow down <S%H7812><s%> <S%H8691><s%> thyself unto them, nor serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8714><s%> them: for I the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> am a jealous <S%H7067><s%> 'Elohim <S%H410><s%>, visiting <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> upon the children <S%H1121><s%> unto the third <S%H8029><s%> and fourth <S%H7256><s%> generation of them that hate <S%H8130><s%> <S%H8802><s%> me,
And shewing <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8802><s%> mercy <S%H2617><s%> unto thousands <S%H505><s%> of them that love <S%H157><s%> <S%H8802><s%> me and keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8802><s%> my Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%>.

Thou shalt not take <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> in vain <S%H7723><s%>: for the YY <S%H3068><s%> will not hold him guiltless <S%H5352><s%> <S%H8762><s%> that taketh <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> in vain <S%H7723><s%>.

Keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> to sanctify <S%H6942><s%> <S%H8763><s%> it, as the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> hath commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> thee.
Six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> thou shalt labour <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> all thy work <S%H4399><s%>:

But the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> is the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>: in it thou shalt not do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> any work <S%H4399><s%>, thou, nor thy son <S%H1121><s%>, nor thy daughter <S%H1323><s%>, nor thy manservant <S%H5650><s%>, nor thy maidservant <S%H519><s%>, nor thine ox <S%H7794><s%>, nor thine ass <S%H2543><s%>, nor any of thy cattle <S%H929><s%>, nor thy stranger <S%H1616><s%> that is within thy gates <S%H8179><s%>; that thy manservant <S%H5650><s%> and thy maidservant <S%H519><s%> may rest <S%H5117><s%> <S%H8799><s%> as well as thou.

And remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that thou wast a servant <S%H5650><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and that the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thee out thence through a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> and by a stretched out <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8803><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%>: therefore the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> thee to keep <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>.

Honour <S%H3513><s%> <S%H8761><s%> thy father <S%H1><s%> and thy mother <S%H517><s%>, as the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> hath commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> thee; that thy days <S%H3117><s%> may be prolonged <S%H748><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, and that it may go well <S%H3190><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with thee, in the land <S%H127><s%> which the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thee.
Thou shalt not kill <S%H7523><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
Neither shalt thou commit adultery <S%H5003><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
Neither shalt thou steal <S%H1589><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
Neither shalt thou bear <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%> false <S%H7723><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> against thy neighbour <S%H7453><s%>.

Neither shalt thou desire <S%H2530><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thy neighbour's <S%H7453><s%> wife <S%H802><s%>, neither shalt thou covet <S%H183><s%> <S%H8691><s%> thy neighbour's <S%H7453><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>, his field <S%H7704><s%>, or his manservant <S%H5650><s%>, or his maidservant <S%H519><s%>, his ox <S%H7794><s%>, or his ass <S%H2543><s%>, or any thing that is thy neighbour's <S%H7453><s%>.

These words <S%H1697><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> unto all your assembly <S%H6951><s%> in the mount <S%H2022><s%> out of the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the fire <S%H784><s%>, of the cloud <S%H6051><s%>, and of the thick darkness <S%H6205><s%>, with a great <S%H1419><s%> voice <S%H6963><s%>: and he added no more <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8804><s%>. And he wrote <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them in two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%>, and delivered <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them unto me.

And it came to pass, when ye heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> out of the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the darkness <S%H2822><s%>, (for the mountain <S%H2022><s%> did burn <S%H1197><s%> <S%H8802><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>,) that ye came near <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me, even all the heads <S%H7218><s%> of your tribes <S%H7626><s%>, and your elders <S%H2205><s%>;

And ye said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Behold, the YY <S%H3068><s%> our 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> hath shewed <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8689><s%> us his glory <S%H3519><s%> and his greatness <S%H1433><s%>, and we have heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%> out of the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the fire <S%H784><s%>: we have seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> that 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> doth talk <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> with man <S%H120><s%>, and he liveth <S%H2425><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

Now therefore why should we die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>? for this great <S%H1419><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> will consume <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> us: if we hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> our 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> any more <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, then we shall die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

For who is there of all flesh <S%H1320><s%>, that hath heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the living <S%H2416><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> speaking <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8764><s%> out of the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the fire <S%H784><s%>, as we have, and lived <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%> ?

Go thou near <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, and hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%> all that the YY <S%H3068><s%> our 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: and speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> thou unto us all that the YY <S%H3068><s%> our 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> shall speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto thee; and we will hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it, and do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of your words <S%H1697><s%>, when ye spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8763><s%> unto me; and the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me, I have heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the words <S%H1697><s%> of this people <S%H5971><s%>, which they have spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> unto thee: they have well <S%H3190><s%> <S%H8689><s%> said all that they have spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%>.

O that there were such <S%H2088><s%> an <S%H4310><s%> heart <S%H3824><s%> in them <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, that they would fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8800><s%> me, and keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8800><s%> all my Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%> always <S%H3117><s%>, that it might be well <S%H3190><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with them, and with their children <S%H1121><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> !
Go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%> say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8798><s%> to them, Get <S%H7725><s%> you into your tents <S%H168><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8798><s%>.

But as for thee, stand <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thou here by me <S%H5978><s%>, and I will speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto thee all the Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%>, and the statutes <S%H2706><s%>, and the judgments <S%H4941><s%>, which thou shalt teach <S%H3925><s%> <S%H8762><s%> them, that they may do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them in the land <S%H776><s%> which I give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> them to possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8800><s%> it.

Ye shall observe <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> therefore as the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> hath commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> you: ye shall not turn aside <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to the right hand <S%H3225><s%> or to the left <S%H8040><s%>.

Ye shall walk <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in all the ways <S%H1870><s%> which the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> hath commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> you, that ye may live <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and that it may be well <S%H2895><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with you, and that ye may prolong <S%H748><s%> <S%H8689><s%> your days <S%H3117><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> which ye shall possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
